chinese: 他在一家知名律师事务所找到了工作。
english: He landed his job in a prestigious law firm.

chinese: 许多专家认为世界气候正在变化。
english: Many experts think that the world climate is changing.

chinese: 介绍是演示的一个重要元素。
english: An introduction is an essential element of presentation.

chinese: 教育和培训为劳动力提供重要的技能。
english: Education and training provide important skills for the labor force.

chinese: 一个良好的建筑结构应该是可用的、耐用的和美丽的。
english: A good architectural structure should be usable, durable and beautiful.

chinese: 如果财务是一个问题，可能会提供奖学金。
english: If finance is the cause of a concern, scholarships may be available.

chinese: 科学家们总是向政府要更多的钱。
english: Scientists are always asking the government for more money.

chinese: 这门课程将帮助学生提高他们的发音技巧。
english: The course will help students to improve their pronunciation skills.
There is a pharmacy on campus near the bookstore.

chinese: 鼓励学生自行监督自己的出勤。
english: Students are encouraged to monitor their own attendance.
